, and is home to Sarah Lawrence College.

value: File:Bronxville Womens Club cloudy PM jeh.jpg

, express service between Bronxville station and New York City's Grand Central Terminal is about 30 minutes. Local service is available between other Metro-North commuter stations. On-board train fares are subject to a stiff surcharge, so buy your tickets at the station or at the vending machines located on the southbound (to New York) platform.

Several parkways are nearby, including the Bronx River Parkway just to the west, and the Sprain Brook Parkway further to the west.  The Cross-County Parkway is about half-a-mile to the South of the Village.
Three Westchester County bus routes serve Bronxville, including two connecting it to the Amtrak stations at Yonkers and New Rochelle.
, it's a logical place to go next.
